profileAlternative.name: Alexander Vershilov
profileAlternative.headline: Senior Haskell Engineer; PhD in physics, Saint-Petersburg State University
profileAlternative.summary: Experienced Technician with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in Haskell, Computational Physics, Computer Science, PHP, and Bash. Strong engineering professional with a Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) focused in Computational Physics from Saint Petersburg State University.

aboutAlternative.text: Experienced Technician with a demonstrated history of working in the computer software industry. Skilled in Haskell, Computational Physics, Computer Science, PHP, and Bash. Strong engineering professional with a Doctor of Philosophy (Ph.D.) focused in Computational Physics from Saint Petersburg State University.

positions.title: Senior Software Developer
Distributive maintainer
positions.description: Not very active contributor to Gentoo. My main activity is around Gentoo Haskell project that introduces good support for GHC, haskell programs and relevant technologies (programming languages like agda, cryptol, etc.). Also contributed to support of the random packages and OpenRC.

positions.title: Haskell developer
positions.description:
Help with project delivery. Worked on code audit, optimization of the codebase and improvements in the architecture of the highly specialized natural language parser. Implemented GC-friendly structures and code architecture, so the project fit all the requirements and became more manageable.
Worked and successfully delivered the second generation of the project parser.
…

* Implementation of the EDSL for VHDL code generation
* Implementaion of mathematical methods written in Haskell

positions.title: Haskell Software Developer
positions.description:
Designed and implemented a solution for testing network and software switches controlling the network. The solution was able to control the network systems that run on the read hardware and orchestrating tests.

Optimization of a network protocol and software switches benchmarking tool written in Haskell.

positions.description:
Implementing various programs using Haskell language.

A small server for updating remove ebmedded devices.

Embedded system for controlling turnstile in subway, system
included communication with server written in Erlang (using protobuf protocol) and communication with device using GPIO and RFID device.

Design of the architecture of smarthouse solution.

positions.title: Software developer
positions.description:
CRM system summport, main technologies are PHP and MySQL.

Support and improvement of a standalone client for CRM system for managing e-invoices using Java.

positions.title: Developer
positions.description: Web site engine development using php, MySQL, Postgres. The main work required creation of in-hourse CMS product and it's support. Various projects were done at the company and I've passed a way from the tester to lead developer.

given.text: Alexander proved to be very strong haskell developer, he helped us a lot to improve codebase and architecture of our project. He has shown very deep knowledge of haskell and how it manages memory allocation and garbage collection. I am really pleased with his work, he is a competent and responcible person.
Alexander has high software engineer skills, he can implement big project completely by himself and has enough responsibility to do it in time schedule.

items: On the bi-Hamiltonian structure of Bogoyavlensky system on so(4)
